EmailTemplate.subject: NCS seasonal roles - get your application in before it's too late!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. The email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact us on seasonalroles@the-challenge.org.
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Our NCS seasonal roles are the perfect way to spend your summer gaining experience, earning some money and truly making a difference within your local community. If you're still considering applying for one of our roles, time is running out to get your application in!
Our seasonal roles are filling up fast!
This summer we're hiring over 4,500 paid seasonal staff to support 42,000 young people while they take part in the NCS programme. We've already offered more than half of these roles, but there are still around 2,000 roles available for the right candidates - whether you're a confident leader, or more suited to supporting and mentoring young people pastorally, we're bound to have a role which suits you.
Need more information on the NCS programme and our seasonal roles? Have a look through all the roles on summer this summer:
http://www.ncsthechallenge.org/jobs/#available-opportunities
What do I need to do?
Just use the username and password below to login to the staffing website and continue to fill out your application.
Username: {!Contact.Email} Password: {!Contact.Login_Password__c}
Click here to login to the staffing website: https://staffing.the-challenge.org/Login.aspx?ReturnUrl=%2fsecure%2f
Submit your application before midnight 31st April, and we will fast-track your application!
Any questions?
If you have any questions about the NCS programme or the application process, please do get in touch - you an email us on our general helpline (seasonalroles@the-challenge.org) or contact inclusion.ss@the-challenge.org if you have any additional support needs to complete your application.
We hope to receive your application soon!
Best wishes,
The Staffing Team The Challenge
